CustomField.description: Indicates if the payment method has expired based on expiration month and year
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(pymts__Expiration_Year__c) || ISBLANK(pymts__Expiration_Month__c), false, OR( pymts__Expiration_Year__c < YEAR(TODAY()), AND( pymts__Expiration_Year__c = YEAR(TODAY()), pymts__Expiration_Month__c < MONTH(TODAY()) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Is Expired
